description: TradeMetrics Pro delivers professional Expert Advisor modification and enhancement services to traders in East Legon, 13km from Accra's CBD. Modern upscale residential and commercial area with shopping malls, international schools, and tech businesses. Our experienced MQL4/MQL5 developers specialize in upgrading existing EAs with new features, fixing bugs, optimizing performance, and modernizing legacy code. Whether you need improved risk management, trailing stops, time filters, dashboard displays, or complete code refactoring, we provide expert solutions tailored to traders in East Legon. We serve the growing forex trading community across Greater Accra with fast turnaround times and professional quality. Our modification services include adding custom indicators, implementing multi-timeframe confirmations, fixing compilation errors after platform updates, converting MT4 EAs to MT5, and adding remote monitoring capabilities. We understand that East Legon traders need reliable, high-performance automation tools. From simple feature additions to comprehensive EA overhauls, we maintain your trading bot's profitable core while dramatically improving functionality, speed, and reliability. Professional service with global development standards.

h2Headings: Why Choose EA Modification in East Legon

faq.question: Can you modify EAs without source code?
faq.answer: Yes, we can decompile .ex4 files in most cases. Process takes longer than with source code. Contact us for EA assessment.

faq.question: How much does EA modification cost?
faq.answer: Simple modifications: $100-200. Medium: $200-400. Complex: $500-800. All quotes fixed-price after analysis.

faq.question: How long does modification take?
faq.answer: Simple: 1-3 days. Medium: 5-7 days. Complex: 1-3 weeks. Fast turnaround with quality maintained.

faq.question: Will existing features still work?
faq.answer: Yes! We maintain backward compatibility and preserve profitable core logic. Thorough testing before delivery.

faq.question: Can you upgrade MT4 EA to MT5?
faq.answer: Absolutely! MT4 to MT5 migration is a core service. We convert while maintaining functionality and adding MT5 improvements.

faq.question: What support after delivery?
faq.answer: 14 days of free support: bug fixes, minor adjustments, installation help, technical assistance. Extended support available.

faq.question: Can you optimize EA performance?
faq.answer: Yes! We specialize in optimization: reducing CPU usage, improving speed, efficient algorithms. Most see 30-50% improvement.

faq.question: How to get started?
faq.answer: Contact via phone, WhatsApp, or email. Share EA file and requirements. Free technical analysis and quote within 24 hours.
